pros: Supportive class that is important for bossing
Lots of useful utility such as curing abnormal statuses, increasing EXP gained, and preventing KO
Has an ability to create a portal to the nearest town for convenience with Mystic Door
Buffs last for a long time because of passive increased buff duration
cons: Teleport Mastery will trigger Damage Reflect
Need to remember to toggle Magic Guard

baseStats: Excludes Hyper Skill Passives, Link Skills, Magic Guard, Holy Symbol - Item Drop, and buffs with cooldowns
Damage: +(up to 40% from Arcane Aim)
Final Damage: +5% for each party member you have buffed (up to 30%) (additional +30% with Righteously Indignant active)
Attack Speed (Weapon): 4 ( additional -1 stage with Righteously Indignant active)
Ignore DEF: +20% (additional 20% with Righteously Indignant active)

linkSkill.desc: When attacking, your attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacking up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the quest 'Victoria Island or Bust' and choose the 'Magician, intelligent and magical' option

Once you reach Lv. 30 as a Magician, talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'Path of the Cleric'. Completing the quest will make you a Cleric and you will be on the path to a Bishop. Cleric is the 2nd job of Bishop

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path
4th Job skills require Mastery Books to reach Master Level

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Holy Symbol - Item Drop
  • Advanced Blessing - Ferocity and Boss Rush
  • Holy Magic Shell - Persist

extraContent.title: Bahamut
extraContent.content:
In 4th Job, you gain the summon Bahamut which debuffs enemies causing enemies to take increased %Final Damage from Holy-attributed attacks and consume the debuff

Below is a list of skills that have a Holy-attribute:

  • Holy Arrow (2nd Job)
  • Heal (2nd Job) - Damages Undead-type enemies
  • Shining Ray (3rd Job)
  • Angel Ray (4th Job)
  • Big Bang (4th Job)
  • Bahamut (4th Job)
  • Angel of Balance (5th Job)
  • Divine Charge (Paladin 4th Job)
  • Heaven's Hammer (Paladin 4th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.desc: Fires an explosive orb forward
When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: [Note]: Always remember to keep this toggled on

primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.desc: Fires a ray of holy magic forward
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.desc: Increases your %Final Damage for every nearby party member you have buffed
details: Grants increased %EXP from enemies for each Cleric in your party (up to 60%)

primary.desc: Heals nearby party members and debuffing nearby enemies
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Final Damage
Deals damage to Undead type monsters
Cooldown is reduced based on the number of members in your party

primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)
Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Does not apply to bosses

primary.desc: Shines a ray of light that damages nearby enemies and has a chance to stun
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.desc: Places down a fountain which party members can press the Up Arrow Key to restore some %Max HP
details: Has a set number of uses before the fountain disappears
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks one Abnormal Status (Debuff)
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Cooldown is reduced for each party member cured by Dispel

primary.desc: Creates a portal that leads to the nearest town for your party members
details: To use, press the Up Arrow Key

primary.desc: Cures party members of Abnormal Statuses
details: If a party member is cured, the cooldown of Dispel and are reduced

primary.desc: Increases the amount of EXP gained from enemies for all party members nearby
details: If party members go too far, the effects of Holy Symbol are reduced

primary.desc: When toggled, when you use , nearby enemies will take damage
details: Has a chance to stun enemies
Permanently increases the teleport distance

primary.desc: Restores the HP of nearby party members and grants them a shield
details:
The shield will absorb a set number of attacks before disappearing
  • If the attack was a %Max HP attack, you will take reduced damage instead
After receiving a Holy Magic Shell, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

primary.desc: Fires a piercing holy arrow forward that damages enemies and heals party members it passes through
Creates rays of holy light that strike from above
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.desc: Releases a holy explosion around you that damages and debuffs nearby enemies
details:
[Debuff]: Decreases %DEF
  • Can stack up to 4 times
Increases %Final Damage provided per stack

primary.desc: Revives all KO'd party members within range
details: Additionally makes you briefly invincible
Still consumes a Death Count for bosses even if revived but buffs are kept

primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Knockback Resistance and %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.desc: Summons a dragon to attack nearby enemies while debuffing them
details: [Debuff]: Holy-attribute attacks deal increased %Final Damage and consume the debuff
Does not stack with

primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
When attacking an enemy 3 or more times, you have a chance to gain a stacking %Damage buff
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

[When Active]: Increases %Final Damage, %Ignore DEF, Attack Speed (by 1 stage) and %Elemental Resistance and grants flat Magic Attack
  • also gains additional hits per attack
  • However, you have reduced Recovery Amount and can only hit one enemy
[When Inactive]: You gain increased %Damage

hyperActive.desc: Damages nearby enemies while granting a buff to nearby party members
details: [Buff]: Protects allies from one KO
After receiving a Heaven's Door's buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

fifthMain.name: Benediction
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 42 sec, Final Damage (all party members in range): +5%, periodically recovers 1% Max HP/MP and clears certain statuses, and have their Attack Speed increased.
Final Damage: +1% per 2500 INT (up to +40% max)
HP/MP Recovery: +1% per 2000 INT (up to +10% max)
Attack Speed: +1 per 10000 INT (up to +3 max)
Can be toggled
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Creates an aura around your character where party members inside it gain a buff
details: [Buff]: Increases %Final Damage and Attack Speed while periodically restoring %Max HP/MP and clearing certain Abnormal Statuses

Effects scale off of your INT stat:
  • [Final Damage]: +1% for every 2500 INT (up to +40%)
  • [HP/MP Recovery]: +1% for every 2000 INT (up to +10%)
  • [Attack Speed]: +1% for every 10000 INT (up to +3)

fifthMain.name: Angel of Balance
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 30 sec. The angel's aspect depends upon whether Righteously Indignant is active or inactive.
Inactive: Appears as the Angel of Benevolence. Grants a buff that recovers 15% of party members' Max HP every 5 sec and increases their damage by 5% and 1% per 1250 INT for 4 sec. Damage can increase up to 100%.
Active: Appears as the Avenging Angel. Attacks up to 12 enemies dealing 1000% damage 12 times. Attacked enemies are marked for 60 sec. Dealing holy damage to those enemies consumes the mark and increases Final Damage of the attack by 50%.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summons an angel to fight by your side
details: Cannot be summoned while is active
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

[ is active]: Appears as Avenging Angel, attacks nearby enemies and debuffs them
  • [Debuff]: Holy-attribute attacks deal increased %Final Damage and consume the debuff

[ is inactive]: Appears as Angel of Benevolence, granting a buff that periodically restores %Max HP to nearby party members and increases their %Damage
  • Damage increase scales off of your INT stat, +1% for every 1250 INT (up to +100%)

fifthMain.name: Peacemaker
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, deals 700% damage to up to 6 enemies 4 time(s) at every interval, or restores 40% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object. Max Contact Count: 12, consumes the contact count for both attacks and recovery\nHoly Light: Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 8. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by 10% for 8 sec + increases damage by 1% for each remaining contact count.\nCooldown: 10 sec
fifthMain.desc: Sends an angel forward that damages enemies and heals party members it passes through
details:
At the end of its range, the angel lingers dealing damage and buffing party members
  • [Buff]: Increases %Damage
  • Pressing the Skill Key again will cause the angel to disappear

fifthMain.name: Divine Punishment
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Attack: 40, Consumes 1 holy light per sec.
Attacks up to 6 enemies to the front, for 350% damage, 5 times. While Righteously Indignant is active, increases the number of attacks by 5..
1 holy light is prepared every 8.5 sec, and you can hold up to 8 at a time.
Cooldown: 1.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Rains down angelic arrows from above
details:
This skill has a special resource called Divine Light which are prepared every 8.5 seconds and you can hold up to 8 at a time
  • Costs 1 Divine Light per second to cast
Deals increased number of hits per attack if is active

meta: Bishop is INT mage class part of the Explorers class group. Bishop is known for their incredible support potential
